item.title: Exploring Kiva loans
item.description: --- title: Exploring Kiva loans author: Ángela D. Castillo-Gill date: '2018-07-07' slug: exploring-kiva-loans categories: - R - EDA tags: - Kaggle - Kiva summary: What do Kiva loans around the world look like? output: blogdown::html_page: toc: true number_sections: true toc_depth: 1 --- 1 Summary 2 Purpose of this post 3 The data 4 What I did 5 Data cleaning 6 Exploratory data analysis 7 Factors 8 Numeric variables 9 What I found out 10 Conclusions 1 Summary 2 Purpose of this post I’m learning machine learning with trees*.
